name: stepler
description: Define iteration rules for certain data structure and compute next step value from input data.

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel -d build stepler.js
scripts.commit-new-build: npm run is-build-updated && git add build && git ci -m 'upd. build file'
scripts.update-version: npm version $(PS3='New version is: '; select version in patch minor major; do echo $version; break; done;)
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run commit-new-build && npm run update-version && git push && npm publish

author: Jeron Diovis
